mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_DEL_Fl, AUTHORITY, MEMBER_NICKNAME, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시" MI"분" SS"초"') AS ENROLL_DATE FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = #{inputEmail}
SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM "MEMBER" ORDER BY MEMBER_NO DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER
WHERE MEMBER_NO LIKE '%${query}%'
WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL LIKE '%${query}%'
WHERE MEMBER_NICKNAME LIKE '%${query}%'

SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NICKNAME
WHERE MEMBER_NO LIKE '%${query}%'
WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL LIKE '%${query}%'
WHERE MEMBER_NICKNAME LIKE '%${query}%'
ORDER BY MEMBER_NO DESC
